reviews.content: Works 100% well on my 13.3.1, haven’t even installed the libpackageinfo they recommend. Have over 50 other tweaks installed and no crashes or whatever!
Working on my iPad 7th generation iOS 13.3.1
Works well on ip11pm 13.5.   Best tweak I have, hands down.
I love this tweak but I seem to be getting random respring with it.
New update makes the white indicators in the dock very large
Please update for iOS 14! Must have.

Works amazing on springboard.
Unfortunately not compatible with Floatydock or Floatingdockplus.
Working on XS max 12.0.1 but still lags on HS pages.
Works on my iPhone, disabled extending the apps when pulling down because it interfered w the searchbar
This is an amazing tweak. It’s all tidy and everything. Just is a little buggy.

Works fantastic on iOS 12. Really like being able to have one icon for multiple apps, and the animations and interface are fluid and pretty.
I have found one compatibility issue with what I assume is Boxy. Spacing is borked.
